Bella’s Summer Adventures: Math Lesson 1

Hi, friends! This past summer was the best!

I learned so much about farming, gardening and grocery shopping. The best part of all this, is that now my mom and I can create recipes together!

While I was gardening, we planted and rows and rows of tomatoes, squash, and cucumbers. When harvest time comes we plan on making soups, pickles, and sauces!

We also did a lot of outdoor activities like biking, hiking, and kayaking.

By answering these questions you learn more about how my summer went!
